author: Travis Simpson (noreply@couriernews.com)
title: Lizards sweep Rattler Invite
text: slideshow MAGAZINE — The Dardanelle Junior Sand Lizards and Junior Lady Sand Lizards cross country team swept the Rattler Invitational on Tuesday with a team score of 17 points.Junior Lady Sand Lizards runner Olivia Gaspard was the overall winner with a time of 9:05. Other medalists were Haven Calavitta, Jorika Alvarez, Anette Navarette and Abit Adams.Emily Bollanos finished 12th, just two spots outside of medaling. Other participating runners were Sarah Hooten, Erika Bratton, Gypsie Troop, Patyon Hales and Lexi Crow.The Junior Sand Lizards won with a score of 39 points. Medalists were Pablo Careon, Jacinto Diaz, Karsen Spears and Tanner Broyles. Marlon Caballero finished 11th to round out Dardanelle’s top five scorers. Other participants were A.J. Calavitta, Jesse Witt, Marlon Ulloa, Arturo Santos, Jese Roper, Joey Phillips, Jorge Alvarez, Logan Carey and Zach Keen.The Lady Sand Liards finished as runner up in the high school division with two medalists. Alisa Kimball finished in second and Hallie Wear in 10th-place. Other partipants were Rosa Guitterez, Leah Bartlett and Erin Hatcher.The Sand Lizards had two medalists in Jose Castalleno (seventh) and Justin Diaz (eighth).
